oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slide Collection - Street Scene, Broad Street at Eighth Avenue
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A Nashville Police Officer directs traffic. Along the north side of Broad Street, Hume Fogg High School and the Masonic Building can be seen, and the Customs House and First Baptist Church are visible along the south side of the street. 35 mm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hume Fogg High School;Customs House; First Baptist Church; Masonic building
Architecture; Buildings; Schools; Churches
Nashville (Tenn.); Broad Street
